subject: Hockey, Ice
Draft and Recruitment (Sports)
lead_paragraph: Garth Snow, a backup goaltender a year ago, stole the show at the N.H.L. trading deadline, and might have swiped a playoff berth.
snippet: Garth Snow, a backup goaltender a year ago, stole the show at the N.H.L. trading deadline, and might have swiped a playoff berth.
